Package controller

Class CustomerScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.CustomerScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class CustomerScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The CustomerScreen class contains controller methods for navigating the Customer Screen. A user is presented the customer screen after a successful login. This controller provides functionality to select a customer to make appointment modifications
